name: mismeasure
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fail to measure the size, amount, value, or importance of something correctly: The contractors mismeasured the driveway and therefore didn't provide an accurate price for fixing the drainage. People are asking whether we might be mis-measuring economic growth. Related word
mismeasurement
More examplesFewer examplesIt was alleged that the companies either mismeasured or underreported gas production, thus depriving the government of its share of the royalties. The landowners say that the company mismeasured the original lots, leaving out large areas behind each of the homes.If the dough is too wet, you probably mis-measured the ingredients.
